name: Escape & Evasion
description: Survival techniques for eluding capture and escaping from hostile environments.

cards.title: Urban Evasion & Disguise
cards.description: Avoiding detection and blending into civilian populations during high-risk escapes.
bulletpoints: Use disguises and quick wardrobe changes to avoid recognition
Navigate urban landscapes while minimizing exposure
Employ decoy tactics to mislead pursuers

cards.title: Wilderness Escape & Survival
cards.description: Tactics for surviving in remote environments while evading trackers.
bulletpoints: Use counter-tracking techniques to confuse pursuers
Source food and water while maintaining a low profile
Employ natural cover and terrain navigation strategies
